AMO-Tools-Suite  v.0.3.3
Set of tools for calculating energy efficiency in industrial equipment

PumpShaftPower.cpp
1 #include <cmath>
2 #include "calculator/pump/PumpShaftPower.h"
3 
4 // 2a If a belt drive is specified, calculate the pump shaft power
5 // 2a-1 - V-Belt, calculated from AMCA 203-90 Appendix L
6 // 2a-2 & 2a-3, calculated, relative to V-Belt, based on AMO Belt Drive Tip Sheet
7 // 2b If direct drive, motor shaft power = pump shaft power
8 PumpShaftPower::Output PumpShaftPower::calculate() {
9  if (drive == Motor::Drive::DIRECT_DRIVE) {
10  const double BLM = 0;
11  const double driveEfficiency = 1 - BLM;
12  return {motorShaftPower, driveEfficiency};
13  } else if (drive == Motor::Drive::N_V_BELT_DRIVE) {
14  const double BLM = motorShaftPower * ((0.68759 * std::exp(motorShaftPower * -0.019791) +
15  3.7558 * std::exp((motorShaftPower) * -0.21507) + 3.9963) * (0.05 / 0.07)/ 100);
16  const double driveEfficiency = 1 - BLM/motorShaftPower;
17  const double pumpShaftPower = motorShaftPower - BLM;
18  // According to AMO Tip sheet for belt drives, a v-belt drive is on average 93% efficient and a notched v-belt drive is 95% efficient
19  return {pumpShaftPower, driveEfficiency};
20  } else if (drive == Motor::Drive::S_BELT_DRIVE) {
21  const double BLM = motorShaftPower * ((0.68759 * std::exp(motorShaftPower * -0.019791) +
22  3.7558 * std::exp(motorShaftPower * -0.21507) + 3.9963) * (0.02 / 0.07) / 100);
23  const double driveEfficiency = 1 - BLM/motorShaftPower;
24  const double pumpShaftPower = motorShaftPower - BLM;
25  // According to AMO Tip sheet for belt drives, a v-belt drive is on average 93% efficient and a Synchronous-belt drive is 98% efficient
26  return {pumpShaftPower, driveEfficiency};
27  }
28  else if (drive == Motor::Drive::SPECIFIED) {
29  //Case of SPECIFIED DRIVE
30  const double driveEfficiency = specifiedEfficiency;
31  const double pumpShaftPower = motorShaftPower * specifiedEfficiency;
32  return {pumpShaftPower, driveEfficiency};
33  }
34 
35  const double BLM = motorShaftPower * ((0.68759 * std::exp(motorShaftPower * -0.019791) +
36  3.7558 * std::exp(motorShaftPower * -0.21507) + 3.9963) / 100);
37  const double driveEfficiency = 1 - BLM/motorShaftPower;
38  const double pumpShaftPower = motorShaftPower - BLM;
39  return {pumpShaftPower, driveEfficiency};
40 }
